name: Brianna

topics.response_text: Well, well. I'm surprised you don't know me. I'm Brianna. I... take care of the men around here. Well, unmarried ones anyway.
Well, that is sweet, but Vance would kick my rather gorgeous ass right out of here if I told you how to find Ian. Sorry.

topics.topic_text: Tell me how to see Ian and maybe we can talk... in private.
topics.response_text: My oh my, that would tempting. If you were that good, maybe I'd pay you! Ha ha ha.{laugh at the end}
I think this is the best place for him. Out there, he'd be hunted like all of us were. Sorry.

topics.topic_text: Please, help me understand your Laws.
topics.response_text: When we all gather in the common area, Vance gives his speeches and then we each have like a Law to say.

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for Ian West. Have you seen him?
topics.response_text: Vance has him in meditation right now. No one's supposed to be in there.
It's the last place I ever expected to end up.
How about just the coolest gang this side of the U.S.?

conversation.response_text: You got the cash, I got the time.
Ha! I told you! In bed you were mumbling about how you think Vance is all disappointed with your progress. I knew he wasn't.
Awww... then how am I supposed to keep morale up around this dingy place?

description:
Brianna is a 19 year-old Caucasian Female.

A young woman who was once a prostitute in Washington, D.C. before becoming a member of The Family. She has a unique condition that drives her to consume human blood, a trait that was embraced by The Family rather than condemned.

Brianna's Personality: Flirtatious and playful, Brianna enjoys teasing the male members of The Family. Despite her past, she has found a sense of belonging within the group.

Brianna's Backstory: Born and raised in the ruins of Washington, D.C., Brianna turned to prostitution at a young age to survive. Her life took a dark turn when she developed a taste for human flesh, a secret that tormented her. Eventually, she fled the capital and wandered the wasteland until she encountered members of The Family in Meresti Metro Station. Recognizing her unique traits, Vance welcomed her into their fold, where her cannibalistic tendencies were transformed into hematophagy.
